item.title: How Not to Build a Cli With Node
item.description: The Who I’m just a dude, that writes shit down. Occasionally I write something useful for sys admins, but mostly my github is a garbage place where ideas go to die. I am @bsdpunk, and I am a terrible person. And mostly I write shells that don’t currently work, but maybe did at one time, or maybe can if you give me a minute. The What This guy wrote a post I don’t agree with and I’m going to complain about it.
